name: NU_COVID_19TestsByInterferonGammaReleaseAssays
title: NU_COVID_19 (Tests by Interferon Gamma Release Assays)
description: This value set contains some provisional codes created for the COVID-19 response. It may be incomplete, as not all provisional COVID-19 codes are available in VSAC at the time of publication. Please contact the CSTE RCKMS Content Team for a complete list of codes to be included in this value set.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting SARS CoV-2 stimulated gamma interferon release),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: SARS CoV-2 stimulated gamma interferon release),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
